title: Kansas shooting: Gunman walks into bar and blasts nine people - killing four
text:
Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Four people have been killed in an overnight shooting at a bar in downtown Kansas City.

The suspect remains on the run after nine people were shot in the incident on 10th and Central Avenue around 1.30am, local-time.

US reports have named the bar as Tequila KC, and say all four victims were Hispanic men.

Kansas City Police say the shooter remains at large.

ABC reports the suspect has been described as a Hispanic male.

However authorities say they do not yet know whether there was more than one shooter.

NBC reports the suspect walked into a bar and began shooting.

Police received a call about a shooting at Tequila KC at 1:27 a.m and arrived to find four people dead inside the bar, CNN reports.

Five people were rushed to hospital following the shooting where they remain in a stable condition, the police spokesman said.

(Image: 41actionnews)

(Image: 41actionnews)

The spokesman told media it was unclear whether there was more than one shooter.

Police said no information about the suspect was immediately available.

Detectives are reportedly looking for surveillance video from the bar while they hunt for the shooter.
description: Police say a suspect who opened fire in a bar in Kansas City in a deadly overnight shooting remains at large
